course.subject: COMP
course.name: Heterogeneous Parallel Programming
course.description: This course introduces the concepts, languages, techniques, and patterns for programming heterogeneous, massively parallel processors such as the GPU and multicore CPUs. Specifically, we will cover heterogeneous computing architectures, data-parallel programming models, techniques for memory bandwidth management, and parallel algorithm patterns. We will use CUDA C as the main programming language.
course.corequisites: COMP 3511 AND COMP 3711
